name: Capture Sage, LLC
description:
Capture Sage, LLC offers comprehensive solutions for your document capture and forms processing needs.  Our solutions are the best in the industry, beating every other vendor in total cost of ownership, return on investment, performance, ease of use, accuracy, completeness and ease of support.
Capture Sage, LLC is not a sales organization that outsources the development of solutions after it is sold to you from a PowerPoint presentation.  Our solutions are built using the hard-won best practices of professional service consultants with over 10 years' experience.  We have real solutions able to be demonstrated and implemented today.  The best example of this is our OCR solution for medical claims (CMS 1500, UB04 and ADA J400), which was built on an industry standard capture platform using our proprietary technology and best practices.
Aren't you ready for a vendor you can be happy with after you sign the contract?
READ MORE...
